TopicTitle: Kerbol size Rss that supports parallax 2.0

Articles.Content:
So ik that ksrss-REBORN supports parallax But since they change the size, i have been using Megapack of it and it doesnt support parallax 2.0 But it has all of the right orbit etc in ksrss, Id the anymore mods aside from ksrss-reborn that support Parallax 2.0 and has the right orbit of the moon etc and is scaled  down to Stock size Rss in a version of 1.12.3?

Edited September 26, 2022 by CalvonVulcan
